DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect addition insulin glargine early phase moderate severe Diabetic Ketoacidosis ( DKA ) child . The investigator hypothesize addition insulin glargine early phase management DKA accelerate acidosis correction , decrease length insulin infusion , decrease total intensive care unit time child admit ICU .
DOC.brief_title: Use Insulin Glargine Treat Diabetic Ketoacidosis
DOC.criteria: Ages 618 y.o . present VCH E.R . : Established history insulin dependent diabetes AND : Chief c/o hyperglycemia vomit Venous pH < 7.24 Serum Bicarbonate < 18 Blood glucose > 150 Urinary Ketones Age < 6y.o . New onset diabetes Received IV insulin bolus prior arrival VCH E.R . Venous pH > 7.24 Serum Bicarbonate > 18 Pregnancy Received glargine within 12 hour prior arrival VCH E.R./PCCU
